extracted_playbook.title: Install Security Updates on Client Windows Devices and Non-Domain Controller Windows Servers
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest security updates provided by Microsoft to client Windows devices and non-Domain Controller Windows Servers to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system a Windows Server Domain Controller?

extracted_playbook.title: Manually Map Certificates to Machine Account in Active Directory
extracted_playbook.description: If the patch has been applied to Windows Server Domain Controllers, manually map the certificates to a machine account in Active Directory to address authentication issues until an official update is released.

extracted_playbook.title: Install Out-of-Band Updates on Domain Controllers
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the out-of-band updates released by Microsoft on May 19 to resolve authentication issues on Domain Controllers.

extracted_playbook.title: Remove Workarounds or Mitigations for Authentication Issues
extracted_playbook.description: If any workarounds or mitigations were applied to address authentication issues on Domain Controllers, remove them as they are no longer needed after the out-of-band updates.

extracted_playbook.title: Review PetitPotam NTLM Relay Advisory for CVE-2022-26925
extracted_playbook.description: Read the PetitPotam NTLM relay advisory to understand and implement mitigations for CVE-2022-26925.
